divs: sighting detailsat the time i was living in raymond nh commuting to work to manchester nh approximately 20 miles. one morning on my way to work approximately between 6:00 a.m. and 7:00 a.m. on route 101 heading towards manchester nh i noticed a metallic silver object (trianglar\diamond in shape)in the sky. it caught my eye becuase it was an unusual color and i have never seen anything like it before. the object was surrounded by a bright blue\white glow. the movements were erractic traveled horizontally across and it passed just above the treelines from left to right over the highway very quickly. i don't know how far away it was maybe a few miles from me. i thought the object might be space debree (satellite) of somesort but i don't think so because it appeared to be traveling horizontally under some kind of control. i lost sight of the object as soon as it covered the tree lines to my right and i was travelling approximately 55 miles per hour on the highway.
trends: There have been 19 other sightings in Manchester
There were no other sightings in Manchester on or around May 13th 1998
Summary: Metallic object inside halo of blue/white light.
